prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Piano, Organ, Guitar, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Piano, Organ, Bass, and Synth Pad are the instruments used in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Organ, Guitar, Bass, and Synth Pad, but no Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are present in this song, which instead features Piano, Organ, Guitar, Bass, and Synth Pad.
